survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Virtual Reality (VR) Museum Tours Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced virtual reality (VR) museum tours to assess satisfaction levels, identify key features that enhance the experience, and uncover areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent VR museum tour experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement of satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled to avoid confusion.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to mitigate order bias.
